description: This file is the entry point of a React front-end application which initializes the app by rendering the main <App /> component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It imports React, ReactDOM, a CSS file, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root to manage rendering into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM under the created root.
